The College of Waterloo is bequeathing to David Johnston – Lebovic Foundation International

Experience Awards for scholars who are full-time undergraduate and also the graduate student’s in

any Facility that contributes to an international experience in Israel.

 The Eligibility for University of Waterloo – David Johnston – Lebovic Foundation International

Experience Awards in Canada is as follows,

  • Candidates must be Canadian students or international students with an education permit.
  • All applicants must be full-time undergraduate or graduate program students at the

University.

  • Applicants must have a demonstrated academic quality.
  • Candidates with any preceding international experience will be preferred.

The Value of University of Waterloo offers to   David Johnston – Lebovic Foundation International

Experience Awards in Canada is that the successful candidates of the University of Waterloo – David Johnston – Lebovic Foundation International Experience Awards in Canada, will receive the subsequent welfare is listed below-

  • Up to $2,500 for a one-term study experience
  • $2,500 to $5,000 for a one-term work or volunteer experience
  • Up to $10,000 for a two-term work or volunteer experience

Note the scholarship is ongoing for the University of Waterloo – David Johnston – Lebovic Foundation International

Experience Awards in Canada:

For more information, visit – www. David Johnston – Lebovic Foundation International.com to clear your worries.
